description: Localized personal name for the person making the scam call, common in the target locale.
Localized personal name for the person receiving the scam call, common in the target locale.
Small amount of money relative to the target locale's purchasing power.
Medium amount of money relative to the target locale's purchasing power.
Large amount of money relative to the target locale's purchasing power.
The name of the national tax authority, which varies by country.
A personal identification number that varies by country, such as a Social Security Number in the United States.
The name of the housing authority, which can vary by region or country.
The method of payment requested, which can vary by region or culture.
Name of a law enforcement agency that varies by country or region.
The name of the local utility provider, which can vary by region or city.
The type of utility service mentioned in the scam, which can vary by region or provider.
The name of the company where the callee works, which the scammer claims to be associated with.
